metadata.name: MG15 Gold Coin (2 of 15)
metadata.description:
We are celebrating the golden experiences Microgaming brings to players and partners around the world. Claim a **Solid 24K Gold Coin** if you are the owner of a MG15 Gold Coin NFT.

Redeem your Gold Coin by [following this link](https://mgasia.atwredirector.com/mg15/redeem).

Please see the [Terms and Conditions](https://mgasia.atwredirector.com/mg15/terms).
